name: Scooby-Doo Mystery
overview: Scooby, Shaggy, and the gang are up to their zany tricks again! With ghosts haunting Drabwell's Ranch and a crazy pirate running Deadman's Cove, you'll have to find all the creepy clues to solve the spooky mystery! Packed with classic Scooby sound effects, terrific Hanna-Barbera cartoon characters, and hidden surprises, Scooby-Doo Mystery is a scream!
